Products, systems and services offered by DÃ¼rr enable highly efficient manufacturing processes in different industries. Business with automobile manufacturers and their suppliers accounts for approximately 55% of DÃ¼rr's sales. Other market segments include, for example, the mechanical engineering, chemical and pharmaceutical industries and the woodworking industry.</desc></svg>
</span>
</span>
</div>
</a>

<div class="container frame frame-default frame-type-text frame-layout-0" id="c13880"><header><h1 class="">
                iTAC Software AG
            </h1></header><p class="introtext-condensed">The iTAC Software AG provides Internet-enabled information and communication technologies for the manufacturing industry.</p></div>
<div class="container-inner-grid container frame frame-default frame-type-udg-container-grid2 frame-layout-0" id="c14923"><div class="row"><div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><div class="frame frame-default frame-type-text frame-layout-0" id="c14924"><p>Founded in 1998 and part of the DÃ¼rr-Group since 2016, the company is one of the leading MES providers in Germany. The premium product <a href="https://www.durr.com/en/products/production-software-controls/dxq/dxqcontrol/" target="_blank">iTAC.MES.Suite</a> is a cloud-based Manufacturing Execution System that is used worldwide by companies in different industry sectors such as automotive manufacturers and suppliers, electronics, mechanical engineering, medical</p></div></div><div class="col-md-6 col-sm-6 col-xs-12"><div class="frame frame-default frame-type-text frame-layout-0" id="c14925"><p>technology, metal processing and telecommunications. Additional services and solutions enable the implementation of Industry 4.0 and IIoT requirements.</p><p>ITACâs philosophy is connecting people, data and systems<span lang="EN-GB" style="font-size:10.5pt"><span style='font-family:"Arial",sans-serif'><font color="#000000">.</font></span></span></p><p>Take a look at our online portal at <a href="https://www.itacsoftware.com" target="_blank">www.itacsoftware.com</a>.</p></div></div></div></div>
<div class="container frame frame-default frame-type-udgcecontact_mapsingle frame-layout-0 frame-space-after-large" id="c13881"><header><h2 class="">
                Location
